attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Cornwall council cabinet  regarding culture bid
attributes.background: As we are in austerity times Cornwall Council cabinet has decided to go ahead with a city of culture bid spending a minimum of £350,000 of our money. They have voted to go ahead with this without going to full council. The general consensus from the local populis is it is a waste of money

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament can't pass a motion of no confidence in a local council. This is something that the elected local Councillors could do. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.cornwall.gov.uk/my-area/
